title: Madness and Mayhem: Gothic Tales by Victorian Women:
description: Perfect for your Halloween reading list, Madness & Mayhem is a collection of gothic tales packed with haunted houses, ghostly encounters, and a touch of madness. From the unsettling descent into madness in The Yellow Wallpaper by Charlotte Perkins Gilman to the chilling ghostly revenge in The Wind in the Rose-Bush by Mary E. Wilkins Freeman, these stories capture the supernatural at its gothic finest. Discover tragic love in The Cold Embrace, lose yourself in the mysterious mansion of The Bell in the Fog, and encounter eerie voices and spectral warnings in tales like The Voice and The Four-Fifteen Express. Plus, don't miss The Marble Child—a dark, whimsical twist on childhood fantasies gone wrong.Whether you’re a seasoned fan of Victorian ghost stories or just looking for the literary Halloween read, Madness & Mayhem will sweep you into a eerie world of chilling twists and unforgettable heroines.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman (et al.)
